column5: Our house is located in downtown San Antonio with very convenient access to the Alamo, Alamodome, Hemisphere Tower, and the Riverwalk.  Great for tourist coming to see all the sights as it is walking distance to everything.  Our house is a four-bedroom, single home and all rooms are listed on AirBnB (Red Room, Green Room, Tan Room, and Blue Room). Anyone renting a room will be sharing the house with any other guest who may be there at the same time, however, respect each other's privacy.
column8: Yellow - Quiet Private Room in Historical Gardens
